content.name: Narrator
content.text: We had arrived at Terra Manus a week ago. It stood as the center of the Terran Empire.

content.name: Narrator
content.text: Grand Star Igna took Kelan's place only weeks ago.

content.name: Narrator
content.text: She was ambitious and it was said she had been wanting to take Terra Manus

content.name: Narrator
content.text: since she was a child waiting for the throne.
